text:
Vittoria Francesca Maria Bogo Deledda (1 January 1967 – 17 March 2020) was an Italian politician. She was a member of the Five Star Movement party. She served as a Senator from March 2018 until her death. She was born in Posada, Sardinia.
Bogo Deledda died of cancer on 17 March 2020 in Budoni. She was 53.
